body.p:
Fulton Co Jan 11th 1864
To His Excellency
Hon Thos E Bramlette,
Governor of Ky.
Dr Sir,

Your Excellency's commission appointing me Major of the 3d Bat' 40th Regt' Ky Militia is just received, I beg leave to Say, that I was elected to the position, without having been consulted on the Subject, and possessing no fitness for the place, I am unwilling to do violence to your generous confidence by rendering myself rediculous therein, I therefore respectfully decline the proffered honor.

Truly Your Obt' Servt'
Ward Boyd.
Ward Boyd declines Comssion as Maj 3rd Bat 40th Regt Enrolled Militia

Commission canceled and Col Hallit notified Jany 30th 1864
